casebody.data:
MORGAN HILL PAVING COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error, v. D. W. IRELAND, Doing Business as Gulf Construction Company, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. February 20, 1928. No. 5011. Allen C. Clements and George H. Craven, both of Ft. Myers, Fla., for plaintiff in error. E. Dixie Beggs, of Ft. Myers, Fla., for defendant in error.

Before WALKER, BRYAN, and FOSTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment in this case is affirmed.
